## PackagesAPI.exportStack() method

Export a stack's resources in the form of a package. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/ExportStack](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/ExportStack)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
exportStack(request: ExportStackRequest, requestOptions?: RequestOptions): Promise<Pkg>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [ExportStackRequest](./influxdb-client-apis.exportstackrequest.md) | request parameters and body (if supported) |
|  requestOptions | [RequestOptions](./influxdb-client-apis.requestoptions.md) | optional transport options |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Pkg](./influxdb-client-apis.pkg.md)<!-- -->&gt;

promise of response
